abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Administration Capacity
            Building Project for Afghanistan aims to assist the
            authorities in developing the capacity to manage public
            expenditures in an effective, transparent, and accountable
            manner in order to achieve satisfactory and sustainable
            development outcomes in Afghanistan. The project will have a
            particular focus on enhancing the performance of public
            sector procurement, financial management, and accountability
            systems. Success in meeting the project's objective
            will be measured by: establishment and implementation of
            sound regulatory and control frameworks for budget execution
            and fiscal reporting, and public sector procurement; further
            development of core systems for budget execution, government
            accounting, and internal and external audits; development of
            HR to effectively manage and operate these critical systems;
            and operational performance (technical efficiency) of the
            fiduciary management functions.
